msbt.message: I heard you really lived it up here on yesterday.I, too, find the allure of this island downright irresistible, .After all, something fabulous happens every day.

A little bird told me that someone did a lot of fishing yesterday. And I hear that someone is YOU, darling! There are just SO many different types of fish to catch here on this island. must be an absolute paradise for a fishing aficionado such as yourself.
Word is that you caught yourself quite a number of bugs yesterday, ! I don't want to bug youbut I do hope you'll share some of your bug-catching tips with me.
So, , you gathered up shells yesterday, yes? And quite a few of them at that, I heard. Strolling along a sandy beach searching for shellsone could get lost in it, .

So, I hear you found quite a few manila clams yesterday! Well, bravo to you, ! I tell you, they are tricky little things! I have the darndest time finding them when I walk along the beach. You, however, have the gift of clam catching. You really must share your secret, .
I hear you're quite the sharpshooter with a slingshot! Took down all kinds of balloons yesterday, did you? Well, with your mischievous nature, I suppose that's hardly surprising now, is it, darling?

I couldn't help but notice that you were busy wishing on stars last night. Did you wish for Bellsfor love for an endless number of wishes, perhaps? I do hope those stars give you what you asked for. If it were up to me, I certainly would, .

Rumor has it you gave a bunch of trees a good shaking yesterday, . Were you after some tree branches or something else?It's true that on rare occasions something nice will fall out of a tree. But beware the wasp nests!

I must say, the sound of you chopping away at all of those trees yesterday piqued my curiosity. Do you have a DIY project in mind? What on earth could it be?I'm sorry, I know I shouldn't pry, but I do hope you'll show it to me when it's done, .
I understand you were the one who cut down all those trees yesterday.Chopping down trees AND planting new onesthey're both important.It is how we keep our island looking gorgeous, .

Well, well! I had no idea you had such a green thumb, !According to the rumor mill, it was little ol' YOU who planted all of those plants yesterday! There's something so soothing about working in the soil. I almost don't mind how dirty my nails get!

So, there's this rumor going around that SOMEONE went around watering the island's plants yesterday. And I just so happen to know that that someonewas YOU!Oh, don't try to deny it. I'm on to you. And I can't thank you enough for making our flowers sparkle!

I heard that you were really and truly expressing yourself yesterday. And I say BRAVO to you, darling! One must be truly courageous to get in touch with one's feelingsnot to mention show them outwardly. I tell you, the more expressive you are, the happier our neighbors will be, .

Are the rumors true? Have you been off catching flights and visiting other islands? It IS true! I knew it! You've been off gallivanting about like an honest-to-goodness jet-setter! Well, it goes without sayingI'm terribly jealous. Of course, I'm also happy for you. But mostly jealous!

Well, well! I heard you were QUITE the host yesterday!I'm a lot like you, . I just love it when we have visitors on the island. Feel free to have company over whenever you want. The more the merrier, I always say!
I hear you were bit by the DIY bug yesterday. I would LOVE to see what you made, . After all that hard work, I'm sure that whatever it isit's fabulous!
I heard you had a rough time of it yesterdaywhat with one tool after another breaking. But look on the bright side, !With each tool you broke, you made a more fabulous place to live.

So, I hear you were QUITE the homebody yesterdaywhich, let me tell you, I completely understand. As much as I love being a social butterfly, I also love spending quality ME time at home. Not only am I exceptionally good company, I've heard that staying in is the new going out.
You certainly spent an awful lot of time outdoors yesterday, didn't you?When one lives on a gorgeous island like this, the call of the great outdoors is impossible to resist!
This is terribly awkward, but I must tell youthere's a rumor going around about you. They're saying that youthat you went around burying pitfall seeds!!That CAN'T be right, now can it, ?

My goodness, I heard that you fell into a pitfall not once but SEVERAL times yesterday! Are you alright, ? I didn't take you for the clumsy sort, so I'm a bit worried. It wouldn't do for you to get hurt, so please, for me, mind where you step, !
You redecorated your home, yes? I couldn't help but notice the racket when I passed by yesterday. You have a fabulous sense of style, so I can't wait to see what you've come up with, .

I heard you were absolutely glued to your phone yesterday, . Absorbed by your work on a custom design, no doubt.Ah yes, when one is creating something unique and wonderful time does seem to stand still.
Thank you for spending so much time chatting with me yesterday, . Though I'm afraid I nearly talked your ear right off, !You are SUCH a good listener, I just go on and on when you're around, .

So, told me that you two chitchatted quite a bit yesterday, . was certainly VERY happy about getting ALL that quality conversation time with you. I'm sure I'd be happy too if you spent that much time gabbing with ME.

Why, aren't YOU just the talk of !Everyone is going on and on about what a social butterfly you were yesterday. You chatted with SO many folks! Everyone LOVED it, .You wouldn't believe the nice things they're saying about you behind your back.
I heard you got stung by wasps SEVERAL times yesterday!How are you doing? More importantly, how is your FACE doing? You really must be more careful. A bad case of waspface is no laughing matter, .

You had everyone worried sick yesterday, !All those wasp stings are just awful for the complexionI don't mean to be rude, but I've seen Halloween masks that looked less terrifying. If you're going to infuriate wasps on the regular, do please start carrying around a paper bag. To hide the unpleasantness, darling.

Why, , I heard you dug up a great many fossils yesterday! Did you take them to Blathers to have them assessed?He does have a tendency to ramble Still, it's exciting to hear what he has to say about the musty old things.

So, you went about the island yesterday hitting various rocks, eh?<10_4 /> How do I know that, you ask? Because I could HEAR you! Bonk! Bonk! Bonk! Bonk! BONK! My goodness how that sound travels. I certainly hope you got something nice after making all that racket, .

Guess who's the talk of . Go on. Guess.<10_4 /> Why it's YOU, of course!Everyone is talking about how you went and buried Bells in the ground yesterday. The ground! Of all places! You know, I have a perfectly good purse you could have buried them in instead, .
I heard you harvested an enormous amount of fruit from around the island yesterday, . Just thinking about all that hard work you did makes me thirsty for freshly squeezed juice.

So, I hear you're the one to talk to if I want to know the most fashionable apps to add to my phone. I mean, everyone is talking about how you were absolutely glued to your phone yesterday, . That can only mean something VERY interesting caught your attention. I MUST know what it was!

I hear you were positively enraptured by your phone the other day. I certainly know what that's like! Have you ever stared at your phone SO long that your eyes dry out and it's hard to even blink? No? You haven't?! <10_4 />Oh, ehme neither. I mean, who would do such a silly thing. Forget I said anything.
I understand you were terribly busy building roads yesterday, . It's important work that makes our lives here on far better. I thank you, .
EVERYONE is talking about the fabulous rivers you built yesterday, . The gorgeous paths they each cut, the elegant flow to it allyou do have a way with waterways.

You did some work on the cliffs around yesterday, if I'm not mistaken. Don't take this the wrong way, but everyone is quite surprised and impressed! You are a far better cliff builder than anyone expected. Way to keep us on our toes, !

I couldn't help but notice you spent quite some time working on the island's fences yesterday. I love that you have a truly unique vision for 's landscape. Just go for it, ! Make your vision come true!

Interior decorating is something anyone can do. But YOU! I heard you did some EXTERIOR decorating! Well, aren't you on the cutting edge, .Arranging furniture in the great outdoors is ALL the rage, I tell you. I have plans to dabble in it myself.
Oooh, ! I hear you earned some ridiculous number of Nook Miles yesterday! It's just SO satisfying to save up those miles, isn't it? I suppose I best get on it myself, !
! I heard the news! You finished paying off your loan. CONGRATULATIONS!Now, don't you go spending too many Bells in celebration of this milestone, .

I'm told you visited Nook's Cranny quite a few times yesterday, my dear.Did something catch your eye? Were you having a hard time deciding whether to buy it? I know the feeling. I really do. But just remember my mottoIt is far better to regret the things you have bought than to regret not buying the things you wanted.
Yesterday you set the island tune to something new, yes? It certainly caught everyone's attention. And it was your creation?! Your ear for musical composition is VERY impressive, .
Why, ! The change you made to the Resident Services flag design yesterday was superb. Talk about eye-catching! Very YOU! Yes, I'd say you have a bright future in flag design, .

Well, well! Someone had fun yesterday using a wand to make all of their fashion dreams come true. Oh, don't give me that innocent look. I heard all about it, .You have to admit, that tool is an absolute dream when it comes to trying on all the latest fashions.

I heard you were jumping back and forth over rivers yesterday using that vaulting pole of yours. I confess, it looks just terrifying to me, ! Honestly, I'm not sure what scares me more messing up my hair as I vault through the airor messing up my makeup when I land in the water.
Well, well, , I heard you bought quite a few turnips from li'l Daisy Mae yesterday. One must be careful with fresh turnips. Hold on to them too long and they'll rot before you know it!
So, I heard you sold some turnips you bought for a VERY high price.I'm impressed by your timing. So, if you have any hot stalk-market tips, I'm ALL ears, .

I'm sorry, but I couldn't help but notice how chatty you were the other day, . It was SO unlike you. You tend to do the listening while others do the talking. Well, good for you. It must have been nice to make folks listen to YOU for a change.

I hear you were quite gung ho with the weeding yesterday.I'll have you know, I have a great deal of respect for those of you who pull weeds around here. It says a lot about one's character when one is willing to do that sort of hard work for the benefit of all.

I know you've been experimenting with your hairstyle lately, and I just want to sayBRAVO! Trying out a new look is so excitingand so daring! If only I were so brave. Alas, I just keep going back to the same old same old, .

Your facesomething about it looks different today. Perhaps I'm just imagining things? Either way, you are quite mysterious, aren't you? I mean, the way you change your look with such ease I can't help but wonderdid you come to this island to change your identity and hide out?! Hahaha! I kid, darling. I KID! Though now that I really think about it

I couldn't help but notice what a shutterbug you were yesterday.Did you take any good photographs? Did you take any oflittle ol' me?Do tell me when you're going to snap my photo. I must make sure you get my good side, ,

Rumor has it you were catching sea creatures left and right yesterday.One might have mistaken you for a mermaid, I hear!Being a good diver is a good skill for an island dweller to have, I suppose. Bravo to you, !
